}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void pb_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // make circle centered and 90% of PictureBox size:Di2015NewLine        int Radius = (int)((double)Math.Min(pb.ClientRectangle.Width, pb.ClientRectangle.Height) / (double)2.0 * (double).9);Di2015NewLine        Point Center = new Point((int)((double)pb.ClientRectangle.Width / (double)2.0), (int)((double)pb.ClientRectangle.Height / (double)2.0));Di2015NewLine        Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(Center, new Size(1, 1));Di2015NewLine        rc.Inflate(Radius, Radius);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        InscribePolygon(e.Graphics, rc, (int)nud.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InscribePolygon(Graphics G, Rectangle rc, int numSides)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (numSides < 3)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Number of sides must be greater than or equal to 3!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float Radius = (float)((double)Math.Min(rc.Width, rc.Height) / 2.0);Di2015NewLine        PointF Center = new PointF((float)(rc.Location.X + rc.Width / 2.0), (float)(rc.Location.Y + rc.Height / 2.0));Di2015NewLine        RectangleF rcF = new RectangleF(Center, new SizeF(1, 1));Di2015NewLine        rcF.Inflate(Radius, Radius);Di2015NewLine        G.DrawEllipse(Pens.Black, rcF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        float Sides = (float)numSides;Di2015NewLine        float ExteriorAngle = (float)360 / Sides;Di2015NewLine        float InteriorAngle = (Sides - (float)2) / Sides * (float)180;Di2015NewLine        float SideLength = (float)2 * Radius * (float)Math.Sin(Math.PI / (double)Sides);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= Sides; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            G.ResetTransform();Di2015NewLine            G.TranslateTransform(Center.X, Center.Y);Di2015NewLine            G.RotateTransform((i - 1) * ExteriorAngle);Di2015NewLine            G.DrawLine(Pens.Black, new PointF(0, 0), new PointF(0, -Radius));Di2015NewLine            G.TranslateTransform(0, -Radius);Di2015NewLine            G.RotateTransform(180 - InteriorAngle / 2);Di2015NewLine            G.DrawLine(Pens.Black, new PointF(0, 0), new PointF(0, -SideLength));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19215782Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static async Task<HttpWebResponse> GetResponseAsync(this HttpWebRequest request, CancellationToken ct)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (ct.Register(() => request.Abort(), useSynchronizationContext: false))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var response = await request.GetResponseAsync();Di2015NewLine                ct.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine                return (HttpWebResponse)response;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (WebException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // WebException is thrown when request.Abort() is called,Di2015NewLine                // but there may be many other reasons,Di2015NewLine                // propagate the WebException to the caller correctlyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ex.Status == WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // caused by request.Abort(),Di2015NewLine                    // so if cancellation requested, Di2015NewLine                    // throw a generic task cancellation exceptionDi2015NewLine                    ct.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ct.IsCancellationRequested)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // any other WebExceptionStatus, but cancellation request has the priority,Di2015NewLine                    // the WebException will be available as Exception.InnerExceptionDi2015NewLine                    throw new TaskCanceledException(ex.Message, ex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // cancellation requested, rethrow the original WebExceptionDi2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19225674Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool ShouldSendEmail(Instant previousRun, Instant nextRun,Di2015NewLine                                   DateTimeZone zone)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Find the instant at which we should send the email for the day containingDi2015NewLine    // the last run.Di2015NewLine    LocalDate date = previousRun.InZone(zone).Date;Di2015NewLine    LocalDateTime dateTime = date + new LocalTime(8, 0);Di2015NewLine    Instant instant = dateTime.InZoneLeniently(zone).ToInstant();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check whether that's between the last instant and the next one.Di2015NewLine    return previousRun <= instant && instant < nextRun;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19229412Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.Add("Table_Name", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine        table.Columns.Add("Column_Name", typeof(string));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("SALES   ", "PROD_ID     ");Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("SALES   ", "SALES_ID    ");Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("CUSTOMER", "CUST_ID     ");Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("CUSTOMER", "CUST_NAME   ");Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("PRODUCT ", "PRODUCT_ID  ");Di2015NewLine        table.Rows.Add("PRODUCT ", "PRODUCT_NAME");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable newTable = RotateDataTable(table, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow dataRow in newTable.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in dataRow.ItemArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("#" + item + "# ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static DataTable RotateDataTable(DataTable table, int groupingColumn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var grouped = table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                .GroupBy(dr => dr.ItemArray[groupingColumn])Di2015NewLine                .Select(grouping => grouping.ToList())Di2015NewLine                .ToList();Di2015NewLine        int count = grouped.Count;Di2015NewLine        int rowCount = grouped[0].Count;Di2015NewLine        if (!grouped.All(g => g.Count == rowCount))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Unexpected input");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable newTable = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < table.Columns.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine                newTable.Columns.Add(table.Columns[j].ColumnName + (i + j));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < rowCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            newTable.Rows.Add(newTable.NewRow());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var list = grouped[i].ToList();Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < rowCount; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int k = 0; k < list[j].ItemArray.Length; k++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string field = list[j].Field<string>(k);Di2015NewLine                    int index = (i * table.Columns.Count) + k;Di2015NewLine                    newTable.Rows[j].SetField<string>(index, field);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newTable;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19240600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UsageIndicatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsUsed { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public UsageIndicator(string value, bool isUsed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Value = value;Di2015NewLine        IsUsed = isUsed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19240600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TokenOperationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Regex Pattern { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Func<string, string> Mutator { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TokenOperation(string pattern, Func<string, string> mutator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Pattern = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLine        Mutator = mutator;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<UsageIndicator> ExtractRegions(string source, int index, int length, out int matchedIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<UsageIndicator>();Di2015NewLine        var head = source.Substring(0, index);Di2015NewLine        matchedIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (head.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(new UsageIndicator(head, false));Di2015NewLine            matchedIndex = 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = source.Substring(index, length);Di2015NewLine        body = Mutator(body);Di2015NewLine        result.Add(new UsageIndicator(body, true));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tail = source.Substring(index + length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (tail.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(new UsageIndicator(tail, false));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Match(List<UsageIndicator> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < source.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (source[i].IsUsed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var value = source[i];Di2015NewLine            var match = Pattern.Match(value.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (match.Success)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int modifyIBy;Di2015NewLine                source.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                var regions = ExtractRegions(value.Value, match.Index, match.Length, out modifyIBy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var j = 0; j < regions.Count; ++j)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    source.Insert(i + j, regions[j]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i += modifyIBy;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19240600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RewriterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<TokenOperation> _definitions = new List<TokenOperation>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddPattern(string pattern, Func<string, string> mutator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _definitions.Add(new TokenOperation(pattern, mutator));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddLiteral(string pattern, string replacement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddPattern(Regex.Escape(pattern), x => replacement);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Rewrite(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var workingValue = new List<UsageIndicator> { new UsageIndicator(value, false) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var definition in _definitions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            definition.Match(workingValue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return string.Join("", workingValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19240600Di2015UniqueSeparator://
19240600Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var rewriter = new Rewriter();Di2015NewLine        rewriter.AddPattern(@"\\[img\\].*?\\[/img\\]", x => x.Replace("[img]", "<img src=\\"").Replace("[/img]", "\\"/>"));Di2015NewLine        rewriter.AddLiteral(":/", "<img src=\\"emote-sigh.png\\"/>");Di2015NewLine        rewriter.AddLiteral(":(", "<img src=\\"emote-frown.png\\"/>");Di2015NewLine        rewriter.AddLiteral(":P", "<img src=\\"emote-tongue.png\\"/>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const string str = "Stacks be [img]http://example.com/overflowing.png[/img] :/";Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(rewriter.Rewrite(str));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19242163Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class Form1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Sub Form1_Load(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles MyBase.LoadDi2015NewLine        Call WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://example.com")Di2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Sub WebBrowser1_DocumentCompleted(sender As Object, e As WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventArgs) Handles WebBrowser1.DocumentCompletedDi2015NewLine        'Di2015NewLine        ' use WebBrowser1.Document.InvokeScript to inject scriptDi2015NewLine        'Di2015NewLine        ' make sure the page has at least one script element, so eval worksDi2015NewLine        WebBrowser1.Document.Body.AppendChild(WebBrowser1.Document.CreateElement("script"))Di2015NewLine        WebBrowser1.Document.InvokeScript("eval", New [Object]() {"(function() { window.newDate=new Date('03 Oct 2013 16:04:19'); })()"})Di2015NewLine        Dim result As String = WebBrowser1.Document.InvokeScript("eval", New [Object]() {"(function() { return window.newDate.toString(); })()"})Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(result)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

19242163Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class Form1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Sub Form1_Load(sender As Object, e As EventArgs) Handles MyBase.LoadDi2015NewLine        Call WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://example.com")Di2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Sub WebBrowser1_DocumentCompleted(sender As Object, e As WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventArgs) Handles WebBrowser1.DocumentCompletedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        'Di2015NewLine        ' use VB late binding to call eval directly (seamlessly provided by.NET DLR)Di2015NewLine        'Di2015NewLine        Dim htmlDocument = WebBrowser1.Document.DomDocumentDi2015NewLine        Dim htmlWindow = htmlDocument.parentWindowDi2015NewLine        ' make sure the page has at least one script element, so eval worksDi2015NewLine        htmlDocument.body.appendChild(htmlDocument.createElement("script"))Di2015NewLine        htmlWindow.eval("var anotherDate = new Date('04 Oct 2013 16:04:19').toString()")Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(htmlWindow.anotherDate)Di2015NewLine        ' the above shows we don't have to use JavaScript anonymous function,Di2015NewLine        ' but it's always a good coding style to do so, to scope the context:Di2015NewLine        htmlWindow.eval("window.createNewDate = function(){ return new Date().toString(); }")Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(htmlWindow.eval("window.createNewDate()"))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ' we can also mix late binding and InvokeScriptDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show(WebBrowser1.Document.InvokeScript("createNewDate"))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

19243071Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction str_xor($str1, $str2) {Di2015NewLine    if (strlen($str1) != strlen($str2)) {Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    $len = strlen($str1);Di2015NewLine    for($i=0; $i < $len; $i++) {Di2015NewLine        $str1[$i] = $str1[$i] ^ $str2[$i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return $str1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19246681Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<XElement> StreamCustomerItem(string uri)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (XmlReader reader = XmlReader.Create(uri))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XElement name = null;Di2015NewLine        XElement item = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        name = XElement.ReadFrom(reader) as XElement;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        item = XElement.ReadFrom(reader) as XElement;Di2015NewLine                        if (item != null) Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            XElement tempRoot = new XElement("Root", new XElement(name));Di2015NewLine                            tempRoot.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                            yield return item;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19248216Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override int SaveChanges()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   foreach (var entry in ChangeTracker.Entries()Di2015NewLine             .Where(p => p.State == EntityState.Deleted Di2015NewLine             && p.Entity is ModelBase))//I do have a base class for entities with a single Di2015NewLine                                       //"ID" property - all my entities derive from this, Di2015NewLine                                       //but you could use ISoftDelete hereDi2015NewLine    SoftDelete(entry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return base.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void SoftDelete(DbEntityEntry entry)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var e = entry.Entity as ModelBase;Di2015NewLine    string tableName = GetTableName(e.GetType());Di2015NewLine    Database.ExecuteSqlCommand(Di2015NewLine             String.Format("UPDATE {0} SET IsDeleted = 1 WHERE ID = @id", tableName)Di2015NewLine             , new SqlParameter("id", e.ID));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Marking it Unchanged prevents the hard deleteDi2015NewLine    //entry.State = EntityState.Unchanged;Di2015NewLine    //So does setting it to Detached:Di2015NewLine    //And that is what EF does when it deletes an itemDi2015NewLine    //http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/data/jj592676.aspxDi2015NewLine    entry.State = EntityState.Detached;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19248636Di2015UniqueSeparator    DECLARE @uniqueId intDi2015NewLineDECLARE @TEMP TABLE (uniqueId int)Di2015NewLine-- Insert into the temporary table a list of the records to be updatedDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO @TEMP (uniqueId) SELECT uniqueId FROM myTableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Start looping through the recordsDi2015NewLineWHILE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM @TEMP)Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine-- Grab the first record outDi2015NewLineSELECT Top 1 @uniqueId = uniqueId FROM @TEMPDi2015NewLinePRINT 'Working on @uniqueId = ' + CAST(@uniqueId as varchar(100))Di2015NewLine-- Perform some update on the recordDi2015NewLineEXEC proc_run @uniqueIdDi2015NewLine-- Drop the record so we can move onto the next oneDi2015NewLineDELETE FROM @TEMP WHERE uniqueId = @uniqueIdDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

19250516Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int keygen(string a, string b, string c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    unchecked // Overflow is fine, just wrapDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + a == null ? 0 : a.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + b == null ? 0 : b.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash = hash * 23 + c == null ? 0 : c.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19258984Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<DataTable> EnumerateRowsInBatches(DataTable table,Di2015NewLine                                                            int batchSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int rowCount = table.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine    int batchIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    DataTable result = table.Clone(); // This will not change, avoid recreate itDi2015NewLine    while (batchIndex * batchSize < rowCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Rows.Clear(); // Reuse that DataTable, clear previous resultsDi2015NewLine        int batchStart = batchIndex * batchSize;Di2015NewLine        int batchLimit = (batchIndex + 1) * batchSize;Di2015NewLine        if (rowCount < batchLimit)Di2015NewLine            batchLimit = rowCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = batchStart; i < batchLimit; i++)Di2015NewLine            result.Rows.Add(table.Rows[i].ItemArray); // Avoid ImportRowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        batchIndex++;Di2015NewLine        yield return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19261812Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T PopulateWithSqlReader<T>(this T objWithProperties, IDataReader dataReader, FieldDefinition[] fieldDefs, Dictionary<string, int> indexCache)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var fieldDef in fieldDefs)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index;Di2015NewLine            if (indexCache != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!indexCache.TryGetValue(fieldDef.Name, out index))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    index = dataReader.GetColumnIndex(fieldDef.FieldName);Di2015NewLine                    if (index == NotFound)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        index = TryGuessColumnIndex(fieldDef.FieldName, dataReader);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    indexCache.Add(fieldDef.Name, index);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                index = dataReader.GetColumnIndex(fieldDef.FieldName);Di2015NewLine                if (index == NotFound)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    index = TryGuessColumnIndex(fieldDef.FieldName, dataReader);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (index == NotFound) continue;Di2015NewLine            var value = dataReader.GetValue(index);Di2015NewLine            fieldDef.SetValue(objWithProperties, value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Log.Error(ex);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    return objWithProperties;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19267112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Insert (object obj, string extra, Type objType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null || objType == null) {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var map = GetMapping (objType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #if NETFX_COREDi2015NewLine    if (map.PK != null && map.PK.IsAutoGuid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // no GetProperty so search our way up the inheritance chain till we find itDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo prop;Di2015NewLine        while (objType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var info = objType.GetTypeInfo();Di2015NewLine            prop = info.GetDeclaredProperty(map.PK.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            if (prop != null) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (prop.GetValue(obj, null).Equals(Guid.Empty))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    prop.SetValue(obj, Guid.NewGuid(), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            objType = info.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #elseDi2015NewLine    if (map.PK != null && map.PK.IsAutoGuid) {Di2015NewLine        var prop = objType.GetProperty(map.PK.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (prop != null) {Di2015NewLine            if (prop.GetValue(obj, null).Equals(Guid.Empty)) {Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(obj, Guid.NewGuid(), null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var replacing = string.Compare (extra, "OR REPLACE", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cols = replacing ? map.InsertOrReplaceColumns : map.InsertColumns;Di2015NewLine    var vals = new object[cols.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < vals.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        vals [i] = cols [i].GetValue (obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var insertCmd = map.GetInsertCommand (this, extra);Di2015NewLine    var count = insertCmd.ExecuteNonQuery (vals);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (map.HasAutoIncPK)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var id = SQLite3.LastInsertRowid (Handle);Di2015NewLine        map.SetAutoIncPK (obj, id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
19267112Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Insert (object obj, string extra, Type objType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null || objType == null) {Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var map = GetMapping (objType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #if NETFX_COREDi2015NewLine    if (map.PK != null && map.PK.IsAutoGuid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // no GetProperty so search our way up the inheritance chain till we find itDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo prop;Di2015NewLine        while (objType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var info = objType.GetTypeInfo();Di2015NewLine            prop = info.GetDeclaredProperty(map.PK.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine            if (prop != null) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (prop.GetValue(obj, null).Equals(Guid.Empty))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    prop.SetValue(obj, Guid.NewGuid(), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            objType = info.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #elseDi2015NewLine    if (map.PK != null && map.PK.IsAutoGuid) {Di2015NewLine        var prop = objType.GetProperty(map.PK.PropertyName);Di2015NewLine        if (prop != null) {Di2015NewLine            if (prop.GetValue(obj, null).Equals(Guid.Empty)) {Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(obj, Guid.NewGuid(), null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endifDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var replacing = string.Compare (extra, "OR REPLACE", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) == 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cols = replacing ? 19271975Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyCache{Di2015NewLine   private ReaderWriterLock rwlock;Di2015NewLine
19271975Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic object Get(int id)//same for the other one based on nameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   rwlock.AcquireReaderLock(Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine   try{Di2015NewLine      if(cacheID.Contains(id)){return cacheID[id];}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //item MIGHT not be in cache (not certain since we're still under read lock)Di2015NewLine      //1. fetch from db BEFORE upgrade to write - avoid blocking all other readersDi2015NewLine      var item = GetItemFromStorage(id);//you get the ideaDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      LockCookie lk = rwlock.UpgradeToWriterLock(Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine      try{Di2015NewLine          if(cacheID.Contains(id)){return cacheID[id];}//check again!!!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          //2. insert in cacheIDDi2015NewLine          cacheID[id]=item;Di2015NewLine          //3. insert in cacheNameDi2015NewLine          cacheName[item->key]=item;Di2015NewLine          //return value  Di2015NewLine          return item;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      }finally{rwlock.DowngradeFromWriterLock(ref lk);}Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   finally{rwlock.ExitReadLock();}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19276327Di2015UniqueSeparator// keep in mind that `id` is the `id` of the clicked on node.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// DELETE api/region/5Di2015NewLinepublic HttpResponseMessage Delete(int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     Region region = db.Regions.Find(id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     List<int> tempRegionIds = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine     List<int> immediateChildrenIds = (from i in db.Regions where i.ParentId == id select i.Id).ToList();Di2015NewLine     List<int> regionsToDeleteIds = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // the below is needed because we need to add the Id of the clicked on node to make sure it gets deleted as wellDi2015NewLine     regionsToDeleteIds.Add(region.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // we can't make this a static method because that would require static memberDi2015NewLine     // variables, and static member variables persist throughout each recursionDi2015NewLine     HelperClasses.HandleChildren.Children GetChildren = new HelperClasses.HandleChildren.Children();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // see below this code block for the GetChildrenIds(...) methodDi2015NewLine     tempRegionIds = GetChildren.GetChildrenIds(immediateChildrenIds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // here, we're just adding to regionsToDeleteIds the children of the traversed parentDi2015NewLine     foreach (int tempRegionId in tempRegionIds)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         regionsToDeleteIds.Add(tempRegionId);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // reverse the order so it goes youngest to oldest (child to grandparent)Di2015NewLine     // is it necessary?  I don't know honestly.  I just wanted to make sure thatDi2015NewLine     // the lowest level child got deleted first (the one that didn't have any children)Di2015NewLine     regionsToDeleteIds.Reverse(0, regionsToDeleteIds.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (regionsToDeleteIds == null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         return Request.CreateResponse(HttpStatusCode.NotFound);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     foreach (int regionId in regionsToDeleteIds)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         // here we're finding the object based on the passed in Id and deleting itDi2015NewLine         Region deleteRegion = db.Regions.Find(regionId);Di2015NewLine         db.Regions.Remove(deleteRegion);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     ...Di2015NewLine

19276327Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ChildrenDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Entities _db = new Entities(HelperClasses.DBHelper.GetConnectionString());Di2015NewLine        private List<int> _childrenIds = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine        private List<int> _childRegionIds = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public List<int> GetChildrenIds(List<int> immediateChildrenIds)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // traverse the immediate childrenDi2015NewLine            foreach (var i in immediateChildrenIds)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _childRegionIds.Add(i);Di2015NewLine                _childrenIds = (from child in _db.Regions where child.ParentId == i select child.Id).ToList();Di2015NewLine                if (_childrenIds.Any())Di2015NewLine                    GetChildrenIds(_childrenIds);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _childRegionIds;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19278802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] EncryptDataAES(byte[] toEncrypt, byte[] key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] encryptedData;Di2015NewLine        byte[] iv = { (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00,Di2015NewLine                                                        (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00,Di2015NewLine                                                        (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00,Di2015NewLine                                                        (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00, (byte) 0x00 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (SymmetricAlgorithm aes = SymmetricAlgorithm.Create())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aes.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine            aes.Key = key;Di2015NewLine            aes.IV = iv;Di2015NewLine            aes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform encryptor = aes.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryStream mStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cStream = new CryptoStream(mStream, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cStream.Write(toEncrypt, 0, toEncrypt.Length);Di2015NewLine                    cStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                    encryptedData = mStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return encryptedData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
19278802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string DecryptDataAES(byte[] cipherText, byte[] key, byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string plaintext = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Rijndael rijAlg = Rijndael.Create())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rijAlg.Key = key;Di2015NewLine                rijAlg.IV = iv;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ICryptoTransform decryptor = rijAlg.CreateDecryptor(rijAlg.Key, rijAlg.IV);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Create the streams used for decryption. Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cipherText))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        using (StreamReader srDecrypt = new StreamReader(csDecrypt))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            plaintext = srDecrypt.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return plaintext;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
19278802Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] StringToByteArray(String hex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int NumberChars = hex.Length / 2;Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = new byte[NumberChars];Di2015NewLine        using (var sr = new StringReader(hex))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < NumberChars; i++)Di2015NewLine                bytes[i] =Di2015NewLine                  Convert.ToByte(new string(new char[2] { (char)sr.Read(), (char)sr.Read() }), 16);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return bytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19281295Di2015UniqueSeparator[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Property)]Di2015NewLinepublic class DateTimeKindAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly DateTimeKind _kind;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTimeKindAttribute(DateTimeKind kind)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _kind = kind;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DateTimeKind KindDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _kind; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Apply(object entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (entity == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var properties = entity.GetType().GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            .Where(x => x.PropertyType == typeof(DateTime) || x.PropertyType == typeof(DateTime?));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var attr = property.GetCustomAttribute<DateTimeKindAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (attr == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dt = property.PropertyType == typeof(DateTime?)Di2015NewLine                ? (DateTime?) property.GetValue(entity)Di2015NewLine                : (DateTime) property.GetValue(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (dt == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            property.SetValue(entity, DateTime.SpecifyKind(dt.Value, attr.Kind));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19284537Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Interaction logic for MainWindow.xamlDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < 10; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StackPanel sp = new StackPanel();Di2015NewLine            Button upbt = new Button();Di2015NewLine            Button dwbt = new Button();Di2015NewLine            upbt.Click += bt_Click;Di2015NewLine            dwbt.Click+= bt_Click;Di2015NewLine            upbt.Tag = "up";Di2015NewLine            dwbt.Tag = "down";Di2015NewLine            upbt.Content = "Up";Di2015NewLine            dwbt.Content = "Down";Di2015NewLine            sp.Orientation = Orientation.Vertical;Di2015NewLine            sp.Children.Add(upbt);Di2015NewLine            sp.Children.Add(dwbt);Di2015NewLine            mylb.Items.Add(sp);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void bt_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Button but = (sender as Button);Di2015NewLine        var par = but.Parent;Di2015NewLine        string tag = but.Tag.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (par is StackPanel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            StackPanel sp = (par as StackPanel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int index = mylb.Items.IndexOf(sp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<StackPanel> items = new List<StackPanel>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (StackPanel item in mylb.Items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (but.Tag == "up")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index != 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    StackPanel temp = items[index - 1];Di2015NewLine                    items[index - 1] = items[index];Di2015NewLine                    items[index] = temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index != items.Count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    StackPanel temp = items[index + 1];Di2015NewLine                    items[index + 1] = items[index];Di2015NewLine                    items[index] = temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mylb.Items.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (StackPanel item in items)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mylb.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19285816Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void OnModelCreating(DbModelBuilder modelBuilder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var contextProperty in typeof(Context).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (contextProperty.PropertyType.IsGenericType && Di2015NewLine            contextProperty.PropertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == typeof(DbSet<>))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var entityType = contextProperty.PropertyType.GenericTypeArguments[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach(var decimalProperty in entityType.GetProperties().Where(p => p.PropertyType == typeof(decimal)))Di2015NewLine            {    Di2015NewLine                var configurePropertyMethod = Di2015NewLine                    GetType()Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("ConfigureProperty", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic)Di2015NewLine                    .MakeGenericMethod(entityType);Di2015NewLine                configurePropertyMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { modelBuilder, decimalProperty });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void ConfigureProperty<T>(DbModelBuilder modelBuilder, PropertyInfo propertyInfo) Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var propertyExpression = BuildLambda<T, decimal>(propertyInfo);Di2015NewLine    modelBuilder.Entity<T>().Property(propertyExpression).HasPrecision(10, 3);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Expression<Func<T, U>> BuildLambda<T, U>(PropertyInfo property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "p");Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression memberExpression = Expression.Property(param, property);Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, U>>(memberExpression, param);Di2015NewLine    return lambda;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19286750Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void GenerateCombinationsHelper2(List<int[]> results, int min, int max, int index, int[] maxValues, int[] currentCombo, int[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int max_count = Math.Min((int)Math.Ceiling((double)max / values[index]), maxValues[index]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int count = 0; count <= max_count; count++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentCombo[index] = count;Di2015NewLine        if(index < currentCombo.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GenerateCombinationsHelper2(results, min, max, index + 1, maxValues, currentCombo, values);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int sum = Sum(currentCombo, values);Di2015NewLine            if(sum >= min && sum <= max)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int[] copy = new int[currentCombo.Length];Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(currentCombo, copy, copy.Length);Di2015NewLine                results.Add(copy);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int Sum(int[] combo, int[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < combo.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sum += combo[i] * values[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sum;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19288396Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void InsertDataUsingObservableBulkCopy(IEnumerable<Person> people, Di2015NewLine                                                      SqlConnection connection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sub = new Subject<Person>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var bulkCopy = new SqlBulkCopy(connection);Di2015NewLine    bulkCopy.DestinationTableName = "Person";Di2015NewLine    bulkCopy.ColumnMappings.Add("Name", "Name");Di2015NewLine    bulkCopy.ColumnMappings.Add("DateOfBirth", "DateOfBirth");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(var dataReader = new ObjectDataReader<Person>(people))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bulkCopy.WriteToServer(dataReader);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        var stopwatch = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        foreach(var person in people) sub.OnNext(person);Di2015NewLine        sub.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        task.Wait();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Observable Bulk copy: {0}ms",Di2015NewLine                           stopwatch.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

String.Concat(@"Software\\Microsoft\\Internet Explorer\\Main\\FeatureControl\\", feature),Di2015NewLine                RegistryKeyPermissionCheck.ReadWriteSubTree))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                key.SetValue(appName, (UInt32)value, RegistryValueKind.DWord);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private void SetBrowserFeatureControl()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee330720(v=vs.85).aspxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // FeatureControl settings are per-processDi2015NewLine            var fileName = System.IO.Path.GetFileName(Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // make the control is not running inside Visual Studio DesignerDi2015NewLine            if (String.Compare(fileName, "devenv.exe", true) == 0 || String.Compare(fileName, "XDesProc.exe", true) == 0)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_BROWSER_EMULATION", fileName, GetBrowserEmulationMode()); // Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE10 Standards mode.Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_AJAX_CONNECTIONEVENTS", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine         SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_IVIEWOBJECTDRAW_DMLT9_WITH_GDI  ", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_NINPUT_LEGACYMODE", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_DISABLE_LEGACY_COMPRESSION", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_LOCALMACHINE_LOCKDOWN", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_BLOCK_LMZ_OBJECT", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_BLOCK_LMZ_SCRIPT", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_DISABLE_NAVIGATION_SOUNDS", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_SCRIPTURL_MITIGATION", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_SPELLCHECKING", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_STATUS_BAR_THROTTLING", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_TABBED_BROWSING", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_VALIDATE_NAVIGATE_URL", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_WEBOC_DOCUMENT_ZOOM", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_WEBOC_POPUPMANAGEMENT", fileName, 0);Di2015NewLine            SetBrowserFeatureControlKey("FEATURE_XMLHTTP", fileName, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private UInt32 GetBrowserEmulationMode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int browserVersion = 7;Di2015NewLine            using (var ieKey = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(@"SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Internet Explorer",Di2015NewLine                RegistryKeyPermissionCheck.ReadSubTree,Di2015NewLine                System.Security.AccessControl.RegistryRights.QueryValues))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var version = ieKey.GetValue("svcVersion");Di2015NewLine                if (null == version)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    version = ieKey.GetValue("Version");Di2015NewLine                    if (null == version)Di2015NewLine                        throw new ApplicationException("Microsoft Internet Explorer is required!");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                int.TryParse(version.ToString().Split('.')[0], out browserVersion);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            UInt32 mode = 10000; // Internet Explorer 10. Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE10 Standards mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 10.Di2015NewLine            switch (browserVersion)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 7:Di2015NewLine                    mode = 7000; // Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE7 Standards mode. Default value for applications hosting the WebBrowser Control.Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 8:Di2015NewLine                    mode = 8000; // Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE8 mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 8Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 9:Di2015NewLine                    mode = 9000; // Internet Explorer 9. Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE9 mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 9.Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    // use IE10 mode by defaultDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return mode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

this.Date.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(JournalInfo a, JournalInfo b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 19293979Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<int> GetAllIndices(string input, string search)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> result = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int index = input.IndexOf(search);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while(index != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.Add(index);Di2015NewLine        index++;//increment to avoid matching the same index againDi2015NewLine        if(index >= input.Length)//check if index is greater than string (causes exception)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        index = input.IndexOf(search, index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19297370Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet oneshotAdder reducer kvArr =Di2015NewLine    kvArr |> Array.sortInPlaceBy fstDi2015NewLine    let a = kvArr Di2015NewLine            |> Array.fold(fun (res) (k,v) ->  Di2015NewLine                            match res withDi2015NewLine                            | []                             -> (k,v)::resDi2015NewLine                            | ((prevk,_)::xs) when k = prevk -> (k,reducer v (List.head res |> snd))::(List.tail res)Di2015NewLine                            | _                              -> (k,v)::res)Di2015NewLine                          List.emptyDi2015NewLine    dict aDi2015NewLinelet data = Array.concat ([basearr; lookarr] |> List.map List.toArray)Di2015NewLinelet dict2 = oneshotAdder (+) dataDi2015NewLine

19301289Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int Count<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ICollection<TSource> collection = source as ICollection<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return collection.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    ICollection collection2 = source as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    if (collection2 != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return collection2.Count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int num = 0;Di2015NewLine    checkedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                num++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return num;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19304093Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetWorkingWebBrowser()
19304093Di2015UniqueSeparatorwebBrowser
19304096Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] times = { "12:00 AM", "12:00 PM", "12:05 AM" };Di2015NewLineconst string timePattern = "h:mm tt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDateTime[] dates = times.Select(x => DateTime.ParseExact(x, timePattern, null)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTimeSpan totalTimeSpan = new TimeSpan();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 1; i < dates.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Assume that each time is at least the same date as the previous timeDi2015NewLine    dates[i] = dates[i - 1].Date + dates[i].TimeOfDay;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If this time is earlier than the previous time then assume it must be on the next dayDi2015NewLine    if (dates[i - 1].TimeOfDay > dates[i].TimeOfDay)Di2015NewLine        dates[i] = dates[i].AddDays(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    totalTimeSpan += dates[i] - dates[i - 1];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("Result is more than 24 hours? {0}", totalTimeSpan.TotalHours > 24);Di2015NewLine
19304109Di2015UniqueSeparatore.Graphics.Transform
19304109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Matrix MyMatrix = new Matrix();Di2015NewLine    private List<Point> Points = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        this.WindowState = FormWindowState.Maximized;Di2015NewLine        this.Shown += new EventHandler(Form1_Shown);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Form1_Shown(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point Center = new Point(this.ClientRectangle.Width / 2, this.ClientRectangle.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine        MyMatrix.Translate(Center.X, Center.Y);Di2015NewLine        this.MouseDown += new MouseEventHandler(Form1_MouseDown);Di2015NewLine        this.Paint += new PaintEventHandler(Form1_Paint);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Form1_Paint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.Transform = MyMatrix;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // draw the origin in the center of the form:Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawLine(Pens.Red, new Point(-10, 0), new Point(10, 0));Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawLine(Pens.Red, new Point(0, -10), new Point(0, 10));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // draw our stored points (that have already been converted to world coords)Di2015NewLine        foreach (Point pt in Points)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rc = new Rectangle(pt, new Size(1, 1));Di2015NewLine            rc.Inflate(10, 10);Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(Pens.Black, rc);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Form1_MouseDown(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Matrix m = MyMatrix.Clone();Di2015NewLine        m.Invert();Di2015NewLine        Point[] pts = new Point[] {new 29;Di2015NewLine                else maxLimit = 28;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (monthId == 1 || monthId == 3 || monthId == 5 || monthId == 7 || monthId == 8 || monthId 19307645Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ToyConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This lets JSON.Net know that this converter can handle Toy objectsDi2015NewLine        return (objectType == typeof(Toy));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Di2015NewLine        Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // load the toy JSON object into a JObjectDi2015NewLine        JObject jo = JObject.Load(reader);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the first (and only) property of the objectDi2015NewLine        JProperty prop = jo.Properties().First();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // deserialize the value of that property (which is anotherDi2015NewLine        // object containing supplier and cost info) into a Toy instanceDi2015NewLine        Toy toy = prop.Value.ToObject<Toy>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get the name of the property and add it to the newly minted toyDi2015NewLine        toy.Name = prop.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return toy;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, Di2015NewLine        object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If you need to serialize Toys back into JSON, then you'll needDi2015NewLine        // to implement this method. {Di2015NewLine                                                        ilost += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                    }Di2015NewLine                                                    elseDi2015NewLine                                                    {Di2015NewLine                                                        idraw += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                        ipts += 2;Di2015NewLine                                                    }Di2015NewLine                                                    iforPts += resultsReader.GetInt32(1);Di2015NewLine                                                    iagainstPts += resultsReader.GetInt32(2);Di2015NewLine                                                }Di2015NewLine                                            }Di2015NewLine                                            elseDi2015NewLine                                            {Di2015NewLine                                                if (!(Convert.IsDBNull(resultsReader.GetInt32(1))) & !(Convert.IsDBNull(resultsReader.GetInt32(2))))Di2015NewLine                                                {Di2015NewLine                                                    iplayed += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                    if (resultsReader.GetInt32(1) < resultsReader.GetInt32(2))Di2015NewLine                                                    {Di2015NewLine                                                        iwon += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                        ipts += 4;Di2015NewLine                                                    }Di2015NewLine                                                    else if (resultsReader.GetInt32(1) > resultsReader.GetInt32(2))Di2015NewLine                                                    {Di2015NewLine                                                        ilost += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                    }Di2015NewLine                                                    elseDi2015NewLine                                                    {Di2015NewLine                                                        idraw += 1;Di2015NewLine                                                        ipts += 2;Di2015NewLine                                                    }Di2015NewLine                                                    iforPts += resultsReader.GetInt32(2);Di2015NewLine                                                    iagainstPts += resultsReader.GetInt32(1);Di2015NewLine                                                }Di2015NewLine                                            }Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                        resultsReader.Close();Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            if (teamName != "Bye")Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                yield return new Ladder(id: tempId, teamId: TeamId, played: iplayed, won: iwon, draw: idraw, lost: ilost, ptsFor: iforPts, ptsAgainst: iagainstPts, pts: ipts);Di2015NewLine                                tempId += 1;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            iplayed = 0;Di2015NewLine                            iwon = 0;Di2015NewLine                            idraw = 0;Di2015NewLine                            ilost = 0;Di2015NewLine                            iforPts = 0;Di2015NewLine                            iagainstPts = 0;Di2015NewLine                            ipts = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Ladder_FillRow(object ladderObj, out SqlInt32 id, out SqlInt32 teamId, out SqlInt32 played, out SqlInt32 won, out SqlInt32 draw, out SqlInt32 lost, out SqlInt32 ptsFor, out SqlInt32 ptsAgainst, out SqlInt32 pts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var l = (Ladder)ladderObj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            id = l.Id;Di2015NewLine            teamId = l.TeamId;Di2015NewLine            played = l.Played;Di2015NewLine            won = l.Won;Di2015NewLine            draw = l.Draw;Di2015NewLine            lost = l.Lost;Di2015NewLine            ptsFor = l.PtsFor;Di2015NewLine            ptsAgainst = l.PtsAgainst;Di2015NewLine            pts = l.Pts;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

19311954Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace ADTestAppDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool exit = false;Di2015NewLine            do {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(".NET Version: " + (IsNet45OrNewer() ?     } Di2015NewLine            while(exit == false);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool IsNet45OrNewer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Class "ReflectionContext" exists from .NET 4.5 onwards.Di2015NewLine            return Type.GetType("System.Reflection.ReflectionContext", false) != null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static List<AdUser> Ldap1(string ldapSearch)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // configuration settings!!Di2015NewLine            var ldapServer = "GC://mydomain.com";Di2015NewLine            //anr = ambigous name resolution, will search for firstname, lastname, email and combination of itDi2015NewLine            //userAccountControl:1.2.840.113556.1.4.803:=2 = only use enabled usersDi2015NewLine            string ldapFilter = (string.Format("(&(anr={0})(!userAccountControl:1.2.840.113556.1.4.803:=2))", ldapSearch));Di2015NewLine            //string ldapAttributes = "cn,department,sn,givenName,surname,middlename,description,telephoneNumber,mail,distinguishedName,userPrincipalName,sAMAccountName,lastLogonTimestamp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo[] classProperties = typeof(AdUser).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // return a list of users (might be an empty list)Di2015NewLine            List<AdUser> dt = new List<AdUser>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // initiate searcherDi2015NewLine            DirectoryEntry de = new DirectoryEntry(ldapServer);Di2015NewLine            DirectorySearcher deSearch = new DirectorySearcher(de);Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // adjust search attributesDi2015NewLine                deSearch.Filter = ldapFilter;Di2015NewLine                deSearch.SearchScope = SearchScope.Subtree;Di2015NewLine                deSearch.SizeLimit = 100;Di2015NewLine                deSearch.ServerTimeLimit = new TimeSpan(30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // define attributes to be returned by a searchDi2015NewLine                foreach (PropertyInfo s in classProperties)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    deSearch.PropertiesToLoad.Add(s.Name.ToLower());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // do searchDi2015NewLine                SearchResultCollection results = deSearch.FindAll();Di2015NewLine                // analyze dataDi2015NewLine                foreach (SearchResult result in results)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var u = new AdUser();Di2015NewLine                    var p = result.Properties;Di2015NewLine                    if (p.PropertyNames != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (string key in p.PropertyNames)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            foreach (var values in p[key])Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                switch (key.ToLower())Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    case "adspath": // always returnedDi2015NewLine                                        u.AdsPath = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "cn":Di2015NewLine                                        u.CN = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "sn":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Surname = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        u.SN = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "givenname":Di2015NewLine                                        u.GivenName = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "surname":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Surname = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "middlename":Di2015NewLine                                        u.MiddleName = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "department":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Department = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "description":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Description = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "mail":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Mail = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "distinguishedname":Di2015NewLine                                        u.DistinguishedName = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        int idx = u.DistinguishedName.IndexOf("DC=");Di2015NewLine                                        string x = u.DistinguishedName.Substring(idx + 3);Di2015NewLine                                        idx = x.IndexOf(",");Di2015NewLine                                        u.Domain = (idx > 0) ? x.Substring(0, idx) : x;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "telephonenumber":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Phone = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "userprincipalname":Di2015NewLine                                        u.UserPrincipalName = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    case "samaccountname":Di2015NewLine                                        u.Account = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                    default:Di2015NewLine                                        // log entry??Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                } // end switchDi2015NewLine                            } // foreach valuesDi2015NewLine                        } // foreach keyDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    dt.Add(u);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                de.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex) { throw ex; }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                deSearch.Dispose();Di2015NewLine                de.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return dt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class AdUserDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string AdsPath { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public i < 600000; i++)Di2015NewLine                complex.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(rnd.Next(), rnd.Next()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < 100000; i++)Di2015NewLine                simple.Add(rnd.Next());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This is the magic line of code:Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(complex.FindAllThatNeedCreating(simple, x => x.Item1).Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19317378Di2015UniqueSeparator    public bool ProcessChunk(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create render targetDi2015NewLine        using (RenderTarget2D target = new RenderTarget2D(Game.CurrentDevice, 16 * 48, 16 * 48,Di2015NewLine            false, SurfaceFormat.Color, DepthFormat.Depth24))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set render targetDi2015NewLine            Game.CurrentDevice.SetRenderTarget(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear back bufferDi2015NewLine            Game.CurrentDevice.Clear(Color.Black * 0f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Begin drawingDi2015NewLine            Game.spriteBatch.Begin(SpriteSortMode.Texture, BlendState.AlphaBlend);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get block coordinatesDi2015NewLine            int bx = x * 48,Di2015NewLine                by = y * 48;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw blocksDi2015NewLine            int count = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (WorldSection section in Sections)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Continue if section is out of chunk boundsDi2015NewLine                if (section.X >= bx + 48) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Draw all tiles within the screen rangeDi2015NewLine                for (int ax = 0; ax < 48; ax++)Di2015NewLine                    for (int ay = 0; ay < 48; ay++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Get the block characterDi2015NewLine                        char b = section.Blocks[ax + bx - section.X, ay + by];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Draw the block unless it's an empty blockDi2015NewLine                        if (b != '0')Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Processor.Blocks[b.ToString()].DrawBlock(new Vector2(ax, ay), true);Di2015NewLine                            count++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // End drawingDi2015NewLine            Game.spriteBatch.End();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Clear targetDi2015NewLine            target.GraphicsDevice.SetRenderTarget(null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set textureDi2015NewLine            if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create textureDi2015NewLine                Chunks[x, y] = new Texture2D(Game.CurrentDevice, target.Width, target.Height, true, target.Format);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Set dataDi2015NewLine                Color[] data = new Color[target.Width * target.Height];Di2015NewLine                target.GetData<Color>(data);Di2015NewLine                Chunks[x, y].SetData<Color>(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Return trueDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return falseDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

19318810Di2015UniqueSeparator public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> ContainsExp<T>(string propertyName, string contains)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //first, get the type of your propertyDi2015NewLine            var propertyType = typeof(T).GetProperty(propertyName).PropertyType;Di2015NewLine            //no changeDi2015NewLine            var parameterExp = Expression.Parameter(typeof (T), "type");Di2015NewLine            Expression propertyExp = Expression.Property(parameterExp, propertyName);Di2015NewLine            //if property's type is intDi2015NewLine            if (propertyType == typeof (int))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //convert your Expression to a nullable double (or nullable decimal),Di2015NewLine                //so that you can use SqlFunctions.StringConvertDi2015NewLine                propertyExp = Expression.Convert(propertyExp, typeof (double?));Di2015NewLine                //get the SqlFunctions.StringConvert method for nullable doubleDi2015NewLine                var stringConvertMethod = typeof (SqlFunctions).GetMethod("StringConvert", new[] {typeof (double?)});Di2015NewLine                //call StringConvert on your converted expressionDi2015NewLine                propertyExp = Expression.Call(stringConvertMethod , propertyExp);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //no changeDi2015NewLine            var method = typeof (string).GetMethod("Contains", new[] {typeof (string)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var someValue = Expression.Constant(contains, typeof (string));Di2015NewLine            var containsMethodExp = Expression.Call(propertyExp, method, someValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(containsMethodExp, parameterExp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

19319081Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(NumberOfFoldersDown(@"c:\\temp\\", @"c:\\temp\\"));                   // 0Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(NumberOfFoldersDown(@"c:\\temp\\", @"c:\\temp\\zz\\"));                // 1Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(NumberOfFoldersDown(@"c:\\temp2\\", @"c:\\temp\\zz\\"));               // -1Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(NumberOfFoldersDown(@"c:\\temp2\\", @"c:\\temp2\\zz\\hui\\55\\"));       // 3Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(NumberOfFoldersDown(@"c:\\temp2\\zz\\", @"c:\\temp2\\zz\\hui\\55\\"));    // 2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int NumberOfFoldersDown(string parentFolder, string subfolder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int depth = 0;Di2015NewLine        WalkTree(parentFolder, subfolder, ref depth);Di2015NewLine        return depth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void WalkTree(string parentFolder, string subfolder, ref int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parent = Directory.GetParent(subfolder);Di2015NewLine        if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Root directory and no match yetDi2015NewLine            depth = -1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (0 != string.Compare(Path.GetFullPath(parentFolder).TrimEnd('\\\\'), Path.GetFullPath(parent.FullName).TrimEnd('\\\\'), true))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // No match yet, continue recursionDi2015NewLine            depth++;Di2015NewLine            WalkTree(parentFolder, parent.FullName, ref depth);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

19321410Di2015UniqueSeparatorCancellationTokenSource cts = new CancellationTokenSource(25000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTask workChain = Task.Factory.StartNew((o) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Running task {0} with state {1}", Task.CurrentId, o);Di2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine}, -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTask parent = workChain;Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    parent = parent.ContinueWith((ante, o) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Running task {0} with state {1}", Task.CurrentId, o);Di2015NewLine            Task subTask = Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10000);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Subtask completed");Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            subTask.Wait(cts.Token);Di2015NewLine        }, i, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine    parent.ContinueWith((ante) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Exception e in ante.Exception.InnerExceptions)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (e is OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //report timeoutDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Timed out while running task id {0}", ante.Id);Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //report other exceptionDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Something bad happened: {0}", ante.Exception.GetBaseException());Di2015NewLine        }, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineTask lastTask = parent.ContinueWith((ante) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //report successDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Success");Di2015NewLine    }, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine
